mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Lindsey, William H.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Cape Elizabeth [Cape Elizabeth, Cumberland County, Maine]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Lindsey, William H. Patient Age: 26. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound index finger of left hand near New Market. Location Wounded: In Action at New Market. Date Wounded: 1864/05/15. Nature of Wound: Minie Ball. Result: Returned to duty.
